name: Pet Detective: Animal Manic!
description:
Update: restarting the game doesn't correctly reset the states :< need to "CTRL + F5" to properly restart !! :((

Well this was quite a project, thanks for the Jam Curdle! Just a note that scope creep was real in this project and there was a lot I couldn't add but I suppose that's the nature of the Jam. As a programmer the ART is very lackluster but I tried and had a lot of fun and learn quite a lot.

NOTE: questions are not randomised :<

Team: Bearded Barazis

Members: Gunnvaldrr and Infekma

Jam Theme: CAT'S OUT OF THE BAG

Story

Six people from the neighborhood have been invited to the annual house party organized by the town Mayor and his wife, Mr and Mrs Curdle, as a big thank you for being such an amazing community. However, the party goes awry and one of the guests' pets has disappeared and the rest have scattered! But which one is it that has vanished!?

You play as the local ‘Pet Detective’ and have been called in by the Mayor to help solve the mystery of the missing animal by gathering clues! The guests are also quite a bother though, as before they will give you any hints or clues, you will first need to help them with their task!

You are on limited time though and must solve the mystery while completing menial tasks in exchange for clues before it's too late and the lost pet is gone forever!
